Articles.Content:
Hi fellow Kerbals, 

I am wondering if the linux version also did the "silent patch"? Even after a fresh install i have just a 1.0.5.0 in the right bottom corner

wasn't it patched or just forgotten to label it?

It did, but apparently there's a long-standing bug with the Linux build not showing the build number (there's been two 1.0.5 releases, builds 1024 and 1028).

You can double-check which version you've got by looking at the buildID.txt file in the root of your KSP install dir. I don't have a Linux box handy, but this is what the current build looks like on my OSX machine. 

% cat Steam/SteamApps/common/Kerbal\ Space\ Program/buildID.txt
build id = 01028
2015-11-10_18-13-08
Branch: master

 

Edited November 30, 2015 by stibbons
Thank you! I wasn't aware of this bug.
